text: Sylvie Merzeau (commonly called Louise Merzeau, 8 November 1963 â€“ 15 July 2017) was a French academic, university professor at the Paris Nanterre University, specializing on communication studies, as well as a photographer. She was a trustee of Wikimedia France. She was born in Paris. Merzeau died in Paris on 15 July 2017 of pancreatic cancer at the age of 53. ==References== ==Other websites== Category:1963 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Academics of Paris universities Category:French photographers
title: Louise Merzeau
